/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their bare branches reaching out into the sky, suggesting that the season might be winter or early spring. A few cars and pedestrians can be seen on the street, adding a touch of life to the otherwise serene landscape. In the background, a bridge stretches across the scene, connecting two parts of the city. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the overcast sky and the leafless trees, respectively.
